00018 #include "cfx_btn.h"
00019 #include "../cbtconfig.h"
00020 
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <math.h>
00023 
00024 //Qt includes
00025 #include <qevent.h>
00026 #include <qapplication.h>
00027 #include <qcursor.h>
00028 
00029 cfx_btn::cfx_btn(QWidget *parent, const char *name ) : QToolButton(parent,name) {
00030     setFocusPolicy(QWidget::WheelFocus);
00031     setCursor( splitVCursor );
00032         
00033     m_isLocked = false;
00034     connect(this, SIGNAL(pressed() ), SLOT(was_pressed() ));
00035     connect(this, SIGNAL(released()), SLOT(was_released()));
00036 }
00037 
00038 const bool cfx_btn::isLocked( ) const {
00039     return m_isLocked;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void cfx_btn::was_pressed( ){
00043     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( BlankCursor );
00044     m_isLocked = true;
00045     lock_Point = get_lock_Point();
00046     
00047     emit lock();
00048 }
00049 
00050 void cfx_btn::was_released( ){
00051     QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00052     m_isLocked = false;
00053     
00054     emit unlock();
00055 }
00056 
00057 const QPoint cfx_btn::get_lock_Point() const {
00058     return mapToGlobal( QPoint( width()/2, height()/2 ) );
00059 }
00060 
00061 void cfx_btn::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent* e ){
00062     const short signed int scrollDirection = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::scroll) ? -1 : 1;
00063     
00064     if (m_isLocked) {
00065         int vchange = (QCursor::pos().y() - lock_Point.y()) * scrollDirection;
00066         if (abs(vchange) < 10)
00067       vchange = (int)((vchange>0 ? -1 : 1) * pow(abs(vchange), 0.3));
00068         else if (abs(vchange) < 30)
00069       vchange = (int)((vchange>0 ? -1 : 1) * pow(abs(vchange), 0.6));
00070         else if (abs(vchange) < 40)
00071       vchange = (int)((vchange>0 ? -1 : 1) * pow(abs(vchange), 1.2));
00072         else
00073       vchange = (int)((vchange>0 ? -1 : 1) * pow(abs(vchange), 2.0));
00074 
00075         if (vchange) //not emit 0
00076             emit change_requested( vchange );
00077         QCursor::setPos( lock_Point );
00078     }
00079     else
00080         QToolButton::mouseMoveEvent(e);
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 
00086 void cfx_btn::wheelEvent( QWheelEvent* e ){
00090     const short signed int scrollDirection = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::scroll) ? -1 : 1;    
00091     
00092     const int vchange = scrollDirection * ((e->delta() > 0) ? (1) : (-1));
00093     if (vchange!=0) {//do not emit a change with value 0    
00094         emit change_requested( vchange );
00095         e->accept();            
00096     }
00097     else
00098         e->ignore();
00099 }
